chapter.keywords: online king james holy bible, king james bible, bible todo list, words of Jesus, bible index, the authorised version, KJV, KJB, KJAV, AV

items.text: Whoso loveth instruction loveth knowledge: but he that hateth reproof is brutish.
items.plainText: Whoso loveth instruction loveth knowledge: but he that hateth reproof is brutish.

items.text: A good man obtaineth favour of the LORD: but a man of wicked devices will he condemn.
items.plainText: A good man obtaineth favour of the LORD: but a man of wicked devices will he condemn.

items.text: A man shall not be established by wickedness: but the root of the righteous shall not be moved.
items.plainText: A man shall not be established by wickedness: but the root of the righteous shall not be moved.

items.text: A virtuous woman is a crown to her husband: but she that maketh ashamed is as rottenness in his bones.
items.plainText: A virtuous woman is a crown to her husband: but she that maketh ashamed is as rottenness in his bones.

items.text: The thoughts of the righteous are right: but the counsels of the wicked are deceit.
items.plainText: The thoughts of the righteous are right: but the counsels of the wicked are deceit.

items.text: The words of the wicked are to lie in wait for blood: but the mouth of the upright shall deliver them.
items.plainText: The words of the wicked are to lie in wait for blood: but the mouth of the upright shall deliver them.

items.text: The wicked are overthrown, and are not: but the house of the righteous shall stand.
items.plainText: The wicked are overthrown, and are not: but the house of the righteous shall stand.

items.text: A man shall be commended according to his wisdom: but he that is of a perverse heart shall be despised.
items.plainText: A man shall be commended according to his wisdom: but he that is of a perverse heart shall be despised.

items.text: He that is despised, and hath a servant, is better than he that honoureth himself, and lacketh bread.
items.plainText: He that is despised, and hath a servant, is better than he that honoureth himself, and lacketh bread.

items.text: A righteous man regardeth the life of his beast: but the tender mercies of the wicked are cruel.
items.plainText: A righteous man regardeth the life of his beast: but the tender mercies of the wicked are cruel.

items.text: He that tilleth his land shall be satisfied with bread: but he that followeth vain persons is void of understanding.
items.plainText: He that tilleth his land shall be satisfied with bread: but he that followeth vain persons is void of understanding.

items.text: The wicked desireth the net of evil men: but the root of the righteous yieldeth fruit.
items.plainText: The wicked desireth the net of evil men: but the root of the righteous yieldeth fruit.

items.text: The wicked is snared by the transgression of his lips: but the just shall come out of trouble.
items.plainText: The wicked is snared by the transgression of his lips: but the just shall come out of trouble.

items.text: A man shall be satisfied with good by the fruit of his mouth: and the recompence of a man's hands shall be rendered unto him.
items.plainText: A man shall be satisfied with good by the fruit of his mouth: and the recompence of a man's hands shall be rendered unto him.

items.text: The way of a fool is right in his own eyes: but he that hearkeneth unto counsel is wise.
items.plainText: The way of a fool is right in his own eyes: but he that hearkeneth unto counsel is wise.

items.text: A fool's wrath is presently known: but a prudent man covereth shame.
items.plainText: A fool's wrath is presently known: but a prudent man covereth shame.

items.text: He that speaketh truth sheweth forth righteousness: but a false witness deceit.
items.plainText: He that speaketh truth sheweth forth righteousness: but a false witness deceit.

items.text: There is that speaketh like the piercings of a sword: but the tongue of the wise is health.
items.plainText: There is that speaketh like the piercings of a sword: but the tongue of the wise is health.

items.text: The lip of truth shall be established for ever: but a lying tongue is but for a moment.
items.plainText: The lip of truth shall be established for ever: but a lying tongue is but for a moment.

items.text: Deceit is in the heart of them that imagine evil: but to the counsellors of peace is joy.
items.plainText: Deceit is in the heart of them that imagine evil: but to the counsellors of peace is joy.

items.text: There shall no evil happen to the just: but the wicked shall be filled with mischief.
items.plainText: There shall no evil happen to the just: but the wicked shall be filled with mischief.

items.text: Lying lips are abomination to the LORD: but they that deal truly are his delight.
items.plainText: Lying lips are abomination to the LORD: but they that deal truly are his delight.

items.text: A prudent man concealeth knowledge: but the heart of fools proclaimeth foolishness.
items.plainText: A prudent man concealeth knowledge: but the heart of fools proclaimeth foolishness.

items.text: The hand of the diligent shall bear rule: but the slothful shall be under tribute.
items.plainText: The hand of the diligent shall bear rule: but the slothful shall be under tribute.

items.text: Heaviness in the heart of man maketh it stoop: but a good word maketh it glad.
items.plainText: Heaviness in the heart of man maketh it stoop: but a good word maketh it glad.

items.text: The righteous is more excellent than his neighbour: but the way of the wicked seduceth them.
items.plainText: The righteous is more excellent than his neighbour: but the way of the wicked seduceth them.

items.text: The slothful man roasteth not that which he took in hunting: but the substance of a diligent man is precious.
items.plainText: The slothful man roasteth not that which he took in hunting: but the substance of a diligent man is precious.

items.text: In the way of righteousness is life; and in the pathway thereof there is no death.
items.plainText: In the way of righteousness is life; and in the pathway thereof there is no death.
